table: Financial assets on which no interest is earned

context: 28 Derivatives and other financial instruments continued Interest rate risk profile of financial assets The interest rate profile of the financial assets of the Group as at 31st December was as follows: Financial assets on which no interest is earned comprise trade and other receivables and cash at bank. Floating and fixed rate financial assets comprise cash at bank or cash placed on deposit.

questions.014dae28-087e-44ee-ab09-3376e5430935: What do financial assets with no interest earned comprise of?
questions.6a850161-ce93-4e19-91ee-c30bb5bc298f: What do floating and fixed rate financial assets comprise of?
questions.00c9720b-4e03-43fd-8f66-21723a0b836a: What are the types of currencies in which the interest rate profile of the financial assets of the Group are recorded?
questions.be588e71-46ba-44c7-bea6-9a6c1e4426c1: In which currency was the total amount of financial assets the smallest?
questions.24f8613a-5516-4f0e-9839-8f6e31480785: What was the percentage of total financial assets in Euro over the Group total?
questions.fb2036af-5359-4b80-975f-3604f1ad67d5: What was the percentage of financial assets on which interest is earned over the total financial assets forEuro?
